name.en: Disaster Risk Reduction : Assessment and Management

goal.en: 1. Understanding Fundamental Concepts of Disaster Management: This course aims to help students understand the types of disasters, methods for risk assessment, and the basic principles of disaster risk management. 2. Application of GIS, Big Data, and Remote Sensing Techniques: Students will learn how to utilize tools such as Geographic Information Systems (GIS), big data analysis, and remote sensing imagery to address modern challenges in disaster management. 3. Real-World Case Analysis and Solution Proposal: The course encourages students to analyze actual disaster cases, employ risk assessment models, and propose disaster response and mitigation strategies to tackle real-world disaster management issues.
goal.ch: 1. 理解災害管理基本概念: 該課程旨在幫助學生瞭解災害的種類、風險評估方法以及災害風險管理的基本原則。 2. 應用GIS、大數據和遙測技術: 學生將學習如何運用地理資訊系統 (GIS)、大數據分析和遙測影像等工具，以解決現代災害管理挑戰。 3. 實際案例分析和解決方案提出: 該課程鼓勵學生通過分析真實災害案例，使用風險評估模型，並提出災害應對和減災策略，以應對現實世界的災害管理問題。。
